Ruben Gutierrez: Professional Website Designer

Hello! My name is Ruben Gutierrez and I am a freelance website designer in the La Habra, California area. I've been making websites for a few years and I'd like to help you with your website.

When I was around 10 I received my first computer for Christmas. When I wasn't taking it apart and putting it back together I was researching new way to try and make it work faster. Fast forward a couple years and I began to help my friends and family fix their computers.

Blog

Here you can find information about me and what I'm up too.

Blog

Figma Templates

Figma is a interface design tool that can help you create beatiful websites. When I'm not working on a project I make templates and release them for free.
